function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of physical distancing and isolation strategies in congested areas","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, higher infection rates, and overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementation of local strategies and guidance for home isolation or group isolation, reducing contact in highly congested areas, and development of simple signage systems for self-isolating homes","Technologies":"Simple signage systems, communication tools, and local guidance strategies","People":"Residents in congested areas, vulnerable populations, and local communities","Owner":"Local community organizations, healthcare providers, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Resistance and unrest due to externally imposed restrictions","Impact":"Potential resistance to imposed restrictions, increased unrest, and challenges in implementing containment and mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Development of restrictions with local participation, allowance for local adaptation, and support to vulnerable people","Technologies":"Communication tools, community participation platforms, and support systems for vulnerable populations","People":"Local residents, community leaders, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government authorities, local community organizations, and community leaders"}]}
